description: May Wong is a new main character added to Kaleido Star during it`s second season titled New Wings. At first, May ultimately hates Sora and considers herself her rival. But later on, she accepts Sora as a friend and the two become close friends like Sora is with all of her friends. May is a really good cook and she is often seen singing quietly to herself while doing activities. She also makes up names for maneuvers and everything she does like bursting through doors or going down the elevator. She also has many younger brother and sisters that root for her. Her dreams were to "defeat" Sora and perform one day alongside Layla.
name: May Wong
